metadata.title: CVE-2021-47501 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i40e:Fix NULL pointer dereference in i40e_dbg_dump_desc When trying to dump VFsVSI RX/TX descriptors using debugfs there was a crash due to NULL pointerdereference in i40e_dbg_dump_desc. Added a check to i40e_dbg_dump_desc thatchecks if VSI type is correct for dumping RX/TX descriptors.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-262.296').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-232.244~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1140.151').
linux-aws package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1177.192').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1176.189~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1184.199~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1108.115').
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1169.186~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1138.149~16.04.1').
